name: Password length
description:
Our poor signon-o-tron team got told to build a new authentication system.

Sadly an over excited product manager has picked C as the language to build it in, "If it's good enough for Google, it's good enough for us". The team doesn't know C very well, so they built a an alpha prototype to show the Product Manager.

Somebody has put it into production on port 4000 to protect the flag.

Luckily, you've been able to copy the binary from the Ubuntu 16.10 Jenkins build machine, which might help.
hint: The team only implemented the most basic checking.  Try running the binary under GDB and see what it does to your input
